newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian rubber stable in late trading.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian rubber stable in late trading.

text.p: Indonesian tyre-grade SIR20 offer prices were generally stable in directionless late trading on Tuesday, trader said.
They said a deal was done in the afternoon at 47.25 U.S. cents/lb fob Palembang, while SIR20 for June shipment was sold overnight at 47.00 in the city.
"There's no direction in the market because demand is very poor," said one trader.
"There are some traders who offer rubber at 48.75 and 49.00 despite the fact most of the goods have been sold at 47.00," he added.
